title: Quarkus 2.13.2.Final released - Maintenance release
content: 2.13.2.Final is the second maintenance release of the 2.13 release train. As usual, it contains bugfixes and documentation improvements. It is a recommended and safe upgrade for anyone already using 2.13. If you are not already using 2.13, please refer to our migration guide. Full changelog You can get the...
